cluster_relations.rel_desc: Proxemics is described as conveying important cultural cues.
cluster_relations.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject nonverbal behavior or spatial pattern communicates or conveys the object cue or information to an observer.
remarks: Subject interpreted as proxemics (distance between individuals) based on appositive definition.
